metadata.title: DOVE Pro Age Neck & Chest Beauty Serum 3.3oz (Quantity:3)
features: Smoothes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and improve surface cell renewal
Makes a real difference in the appearance of you skin's condition
description: Dove Pro-Age Neck & Chest Beauty Serum makes a real difference in the appearance of you skin's condition. It contains specially selected oils to smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and improve surface cell renewal.
